reviews.review_msg: The content is super interesting and very informative. She is very clear and organized. The only reason she sent 20 emails is to answer the students asking silly questions (i.e. "do I need to actually have sources in my scientific paper") This class isn't handed to you, you need to study. Tests had some hard questions for sure.

I am coming to class to be taught, not have a video put on while she relaxes as if this is some expensive daycare rather than university. Dr Chin is a terrible prof, she is unclear and rude.  If you are an involved student who wants to succeed she will not help you, in fact she will send excessive emails in caps explaining nothing.

Worst prof I've never had. The content is interesting but she's very unorganized and her midterms are nothing like how she said they'll be. The midterms are not fair and it's very hard to do well in this course. Don't suggest it if you don't need to take it.
